title: Machine Learning Practical Competency Strengthening: Wireless Network Optimization: GNN-Based Simulation Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary wireless network concepts and understanding of machine learning
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain how beamforming vectors and user allocation decisions impact network performance in wireless environments.
Learners can simulate the implementation of solving integer-constrained user assignment problems using GNN-based models.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the improvement effects on transmission speed (sum-rate) through optimized network configurations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
